articles.title: The FCC is letting SpaceX launch 7,500 more Starlink satellites
articles.description: The FCC approved SpaceX's plan to launch an additional 7,500 Gen2 Starlink satellites on Friday. That brings the total number of satellites the company will have in orbit to around 15,000 worldwide.
